page.title: 13Shopping in Laggan
page.content: In the past most people had to travel to Newtonmore to do some of their shopping.They now do all their shopping at the local village shop in which they all have a paid share.This store is called The Laggan Community Trading Limited and is a cooperative formed by the people with the help of the H.I.D.B. now all deliveries are made by the Cooperative Wholesale Society.By 1984 private ownership had been proving unsuccessful for owners and customers,and the practice of self help already applied by the population to maintain their T.V reception (see Media) was once again brought into use.The shop is run by a manager under the guidance of an elected committee. This is proving beneficial to all.From the birth of the idea 1984 to the appointment of manager took only 3 months of hard work & cooperation.
